sentences.en: A non-aggression pact will be signed between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 两国将签署互不侵犯条约。

sentences.en: Aggression is by no means a male-only trait.
sentences.cn: 好斗性绝非男性才具有的特征。

sentences.en: an admixture of aggression and creativity
sentences.cn: 进取精神和创意的结合

sentences.en: Her view is that aggression is part of human nature.
sentences.cn: 她认为攻击性是人类本性的一部份.

sentences.en: His new relationship with Germany is enshrined in a new non-aggression treaty.
sentences.cn: 他与德国的新关系受新的互不侵犯条约的保护。

sentences.en: His relentless aggression bludgeons you into seeing his point.
sentences.cn: 他咄咄逼人地强迫你了解他的看法。

sentences.en: If you make aggression pay, this becomes the law of the jungle.
sentences.cn: 如果你通过侵略谋取利益，这就成了弱肉强食。

sentences.en: Last month he signed a new non-aggression pact with Germany.
sentences.cn: 上个月，他与德国签订了新的互不侵犯条约。

sentences.en: So long as we are firmly united, we need fear no aggression.
sentences.cn: 只要我们紧密地团结, 就不必惧怕外来侵略.

sentences.en: Such aids amount to economic aggression.
sentences.cn: 这种援助其实是经济侵略.

sentences.en: Television violence can encourage aggression in children.
sentences.cn: 电视暴力会助长儿童的攻击性行为。

sentences.en: The aggression of a bully leaves people feeling hurt, angry and impotent.
sentences.cn: 暴徒的侵犯令人们感到痛心、愤怒却又无能为力。

sentences.en: The agreement includes a pledge of non-aggression.
sentences.cn: 协议包括不发动侵略的保证。

sentences.en: The raid was an unjustifiable act of aggression.
sentences.cn: 那次偷袭是一种不正当的侵略行径。

sentences.en: The research shows that computer games may cause aggression.
sentences.cn: 研究显示，电脑游戏可能引起好斗情绪。

words.tran_cn: 侵略性的；好斗的；有进取心的；有闯劲的
侵略地；攻击地；有闯劲地

trans.tran_cn: 好斗性，攻击性，侵犯，侵略
trans.tran_en: the act of attacking a country, especially when that country has not attacked first
